subject: Baseball
Anger (Emotion)
lead_paragraph: Ichiro Suzuki may soon join the 4,000-hit club. His first name, when translated into English, is “most cheerful boy,” but close watchers know that his demeanor is a little more complicated.
snippet: Ichiro Suzuki may soon join the 4,000-hit club. His first name, when translated into English, is “most cheerful boy,” but close watchers know that his demeanor is a little more complicated.
